game.beginning: The year is 2256, and humanity has colonized several planets across the galaxy.
game.ending: After a long and grueling battle with an alien empire, the player emerges victorious, saving humanity from extinction.
game.synopsis: Rebel'S Rise is a sci-fi role-playing game where players take on the role of a young rebel leader fighting against an oppressive alien regime that has taken over Earth. As they journey through the galaxy, they gather allies and resources to build their resistance movement. Along the way, they uncover secrets about their own past and the true nature of the alien threat.
game.title: Rebel'S Rise
